Sequence Information.Peptide Name: DefMT7 (defensin MT7; hard ticks, arachnids, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: The peptide showed no activity against bacteria. It showed antimalarial activity.

Literature.Title: Antiplasmodial Activity Is an Ancient and Conserved Feature of Tick Defensins.
Literature.Author: Cabezas-Cruz A, Tonk M, Bouchut A, Pierrot C, Pierce RJ, Kotsyfakis M, Rahnamaeian M, Vilcinskas A, Khalife J, Vald

Literature.Title: Ixodes ricinus defensins attack distantly-related pathogens.
